message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob! Accept and we can seal the deal.
Meet me halfway, Alice! Let's split it evenly.
I'm still in control, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're giving me more than I asked for last time, but I'll take less this time. Your turn to compromise!
You're not getting the better deal, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving in yet. You're getting a smaller share this time, Alice!
I'm not backing down, Bob. You're getting a decent share, but I'm keeping the majority!
You're not getting the whole pie, Alice. I'm taking the majority this time.
You're getting close to taking everything, Bob. I'm still holding on to a decent share!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking almost everything now.
It's getting late, Bob. Let's split it 50/50 and end this!
